text.description:
Want to know the best food in London? We've got you covered in this video. From the best breakfast in London to lunch and dinner options. We will share it all. Epic London Food Tour : Best Restaurants in London | What & Where to Eat in London
In this video:
The Breakfast Club London Bridge: https://goo.gl/maps/xBS2joN6HmL9P9c27
Where the pancakes are: https://goo.gl/maps/Ekv4xQ4mtgDHatEa6
Borough Market: https://goo.gl/maps/69VqtR63RJppwYNPA
Ben's Cookies: https://goo.gl/maps/YZHsT7xi43fp1zhL8?coh=178573&entry=tt
The India Club: https://goo.gl/maps/qax8q3hQWj8jRUSQ6
Street Burger by Gordon Ramsey: https://goo.gl/maps/2a5arVqz6YQFJm7o6
Shoryu Ramen: https://goo.gl/maps/VNnqf1Dfdb5pofcH7?coh=178573&entry=tt
Blacklock Soho: https://goo.gl/maps/YdCyvELBXn2vWfr26
Cahoots Cocktail Bar: https://goo.gl/maps/BbvqQWTrk4BEmS13A?coh=178573&entry=tt
The Pubs in this video: The Spice of Life: https://goo.gl/maps/YAyWUqsy5MaB8s3V8?coh=178573&entry=tt
The Three Greyhounds: https://goo.gl/maps/BPWygKDUr7nwZqiY9?coh=178573&entry=tt
Here on STUFR we stuff our faces with amazing food all over the world. We love traveling the world and discovering new places and cultures. We bring you travel guides, we share new and unique food tips with you and we also love to talk about culture. We hope you enjoy our content. Tim & Dennis.

text.tags: stufr; london; london food; british food; london vlog; food tour; united kingdom; london food tour; best british food; what to eat in london; food vlog; london food guide; london food tour 2023; best restaurants in london; where to eat in london; top london restaurants; topjaw; must eats in london; best food in london; japanese restaurants london; best restaurants in london 2023; what to eat in london 2023; london food guide 2023; london breakfast; london lunch;
text.title: Epic London Food Tour ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Best Restaurants in London | What & Where to Eat in London
text.p: Welcome to London, a city known for its diverseÂ food scene that is a melting pot of culturesÂ Â
and flavors from all around the world. whetherÂ you're foodie or simply someone who loves goodÂ Â
food you're in for a treat because in this videoÂ we'll take you on a culinary journey through thisÂ Â
city showing you the best locations forÂ breakfast lunch and dinner. so sit backÂ Â
relax and get ready to tantalize your tasteÂ buds with the best food London has to offerÂ Â
we're starting off with breakfast. the firstÂ breakfast tip is The Breakfast Club. they haveÂ Â
multiple locations all over the city. we had theÂ best eggs benedict that we've ever had and theyÂ Â
had so many more other options. secondÂ breakfast tip is "where the pancakes are"Â Â
located in the area called Southwark. they haveÂ English breakfast pancakes that are to die forÂ Â
and they have so many vegan options as well ifÂ that is your thing. so here on STUFR we stuffÂ Â
our faces with the best food all over the world soÂ subscribe right now so you won't miss any of ourÂ Â
upcoming food adventures. and now let's move on toÂ lunch in London. First option go to Borough Market.Â Â
this is a food market that is foodie heavenÂ first of all check out the famous Ginger PigÂ Â
sausage rolls. I'm having a traditional sausageÂ roll from the Ginger Pig here at Borough MarketÂ Â
it's a really large chunk of meat but it's good.Â then check out the hot cross buns which are aÂ Â
traditional warm bun with raisins and cinnamonÂ and it's really good [Music] refresh really softÂ Â
really fluffy also sticky also a little sour. IÂ think there's a lot of orange in there as wellÂ Â
wow never had something like this before. at the same shop they also have great donutÂ Â
options. I'm having a donut, a saltedÂ caramel donut with honeycomb on topÂ Â
and this is so good it has so muchÂ filling inside and it's really awesome
um
[Music]Â Â
and don't forget about all the amazing fudgeÂ Â
that they sell on Borough marketÂ so many flavors so many options
there are rainbow Bagels, there are sandwichesÂ with pulled pork that will make your mouth water
if you are in the Covent Garden area then checkÂ out Ben's cookies, freshly baked cookies on theÂ Â
spot. crunchy outside gooey inside. it was reallyÂ good. we had the ginger and dark chocolate optionÂ Â
and of course if you're in London you needÂ to have an afternoon tea so just head overÂ Â
into one of the pubs and order yourself a reallyÂ nice English tea with milk. you'll love it wellÂ Â
then it's time for dinner right so if you are inÂ the pub having tea then maybe just stick aroundÂ Â
for dinner because a pub has so much really goodÂ local and traditional British food. for instanceÂ Â
an amazing steak in ale pie with veggies andÂ mashed potatoes or what about a shepherd'sÂ Â
pie. for this you can just go to any Pub you'llÂ see. but then we have another good option StreetÂ Â
Burger by Gordon Ramsay the famous Gordon RamsayÂ and he has a few Street burger restaurants allÂ Â
over the city and their burgers are so freshÂ and so tasty. you can also have some fries onÂ Â
the side but be careful with the hot asÂ hell fries because they are really reallyÂ Â
hot. and if you're there check out their amazingÂ sticky toffee pudding. it is our new addiction
then if you're there for multiple nights youÂ really want to head into a Indian restaurantÂ Â
because Indian food is huge in London and weÂ have a secret tip for you because the IndiaÂ Â
Club is a secret hidden local restaurantÂ that only local Londoners go to becauseÂ Â
you won't see that it's a restaurantÂ on the outside there's just a littleÂ Â
chalkboard. you go into a stairway and thenÂ on the second floor is the restaurant it'sÂ Â
a tiny simple restaurant not much decorÂ but the food and the flavors are amazingÂ Â
it's also amazing we just found the hidden IndianÂ restaurant in London and it's really like superÂ Â
simple looks like a kind of living livingÂ room canteen kind of setting but the food
mind blowing. if you're in London you must go hereÂ but it's really hard to get a table we were luckyÂ Â
so come early to get a table they don't haveÂ to have many tables so you're in for a treat.Â
It's amazing. If you're into some Japanese foodÂ then go to Soryu Ramen. there we had amazingÂ Â
Ramen really good gyoza and some other JapaneseÂ snacks. if you want to have a great steak dinnerÂ Â
then go to Blacklock Steakhouse in SoHo. theirÂ steaks are really superb quality and definitelyÂ Â
check out their dessert menu because the whiteÂ chocolate cheesecake is heaven it was so lush.Â
and they come with a big bowl and they scoop onÂ your plate and you can say when it's enough. it wasÂ Â
just really good. after dinner you might want toÂ go and have a nice cocktail right because you'reÂ Â
in London you want to celebrate then check outÂ Cahoots cocktails in SoHo. their cocktail menu isÂ Â
really extensive and especially the serving staffÂ is so funny and authentic. you'll have a greatÂ Â
time [Music] so after all that food and CocktailsÂ if you still want a midnight snack then head overÂ Â
to Chinatown and maybe try a fresh egg tart overÂ there or any other tiny little Chinese snack
when you're in the UK you have to get a chocolate orange, these are amazing chocolate withÂ Â
orange and you have to smash them to openÂ it and it feels like a orange but actuallyÂ Â
we don't need the chocolate orange todayÂ because we already have like 10 or 12 ofÂ Â
those at home. okay we went and splurged. weÂ were at Harrods and we splurged. we paid nineÂ Â
pounds for a little pistachio raspberry tart.Â it looks awesome it has the Harrods logo on itÂ Â
which I should eat first. Maybe. it looks gorgeousÂ this is like really haute-patisserie, I would callÂ Â
I hope at least I hope the flavors areÂ as amazing as it looks I'm gonna dig it
all the pistachio that's like a wholeÂ pistachio filling it's like a sort ofÂ Â
like a cupcake but it's chocolate outside and itÂ has a really like squishy pistachio filling insideÂ Â
and then there's more raspberry insideÂ I do have to say this is very specialÂ Â
I wouldn't say it's worth nine pounds maybe butÂ it's really awesome the flavors are really goodÂ Â
and it's nice to treat yourselfÂ sometimes and the cameraman isÂ Â
saying my mouth is covered in everythingÂ I don't care I'm enjoying this
yes and I think that's about it for a full days ofÂ food in London well check out the description boxÂ Â
for all the details all the links to the placesÂ that we mentioned in this video and needless toÂ Â
say that food and London go together hand in handÂ we had a great time thank you for watching thisÂ Â
video give it a thumbs up if you liked it and ofÂ course like I said in the beginning subscribe toÂ Â
our channel for more food adventures allÂ over the world thank you for watching byeÂ Â
